definition: the men of today are sadly degenerated (idiom)

sentences.english: From this, we can see that there are reasons why people no longer follow ancient ways, and why moral values have declined.
sentences.chinese: 由這點看來，人心不古，道德淪亡，這是有原因的。

sentences.english: This debt we pay to human guile;
sentences.chinese: 這是我們替人心不古償還的債。

sentences.english: Though this is not necessarily due to "degeneration of public morality", I do have good reasons to call it the tragedy of life.
sentences.chinese: 這並不一定是“人心不古”，實可以說是人生的悲劇。
